column1: Art Institute of Chicago////I go so often and stay for so long each time I'm pretty sure some of the security guards know me (esp. in the sections I like the best). The admission is pretty steep but I have literally never paid a cent and I've been there countless times. Obviously for visitors it's different
column2: but if you're in the Chicago area
column3: it's free every Wednesday (used to be only Thursday evenings). And generally if you use the side entrance
column4: the line is shorter than the one on Michigan Ave.
